entry.content:
The best poetry (art?) (unfolds itself in fighting)

when you can’t find (locate) in the world what you so desperately need.

It unfurls in midst of the clamor.

In writing the loss and in (voicing, wailing?) speaking the eulogy, and the deep mourning, brings about what is needed.

(Joys?)

And most importantly, in that final turn, realize (realizing?) (a pain fully felt is never yours) the pain was never yours.

(It is fleeting)

Just a way for you to create; terraform and leave behind the breadcrumbs (compost, tree motif) for those to come.

title words: terraform, cultivate, till,
